subject: Mathematics
question_text: Given below are two statements : one is labelled as Reason (R) . : The angular speed of the moon in its orbit about the earth is more than the angular speed of the earth in its orbit about the sun. Reason (R) : The moon takes less time to move around the earth than the time taken by the earth to move explanation of A.

options.text: (1) (A) is correct but (R) is not correct
(2) Both (A) and (R) are correct and (R) is the correct
(3) Both (A) and (R) are correct but (R) is not the
(4) (A) is not correct but (R) is correct
